text: Erik Carlsson, aka "Carlsson på taket" ("Carlsson on the roof"), (5 March 1929 – 27 May 2015) was a Swedish rally driver for Saab. Carlsson was born in Trollhättan. Erik Carlsson married Pat Moss on 3 March 1963 in London. Carlsson died on 27 May 2015, aged 86. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swedish racecar drivers Category:People from Trollhättan
title: Erik Carlsson
